item.title: Fullstack Blog System
item.description:
This blog system is driven by React Hooks, Next.js, Egg.js, MySQL and Antd Design. You can check the code in my github repo.

  • Build front-end
  • Build the middleware and connect with frontend
  • Build backstage management system

Front End

Main Page

This is the main page for this Blog, it basically consists of top and recent articles, the self introduction, the header and some place for advertisement.

Article

You can easily check the addtime, type and view count of this article and get access to full text. The main page is built with code highlighter

List

You can check the list of articles in certain types here. In the picture below, the “Article” list of articles are shown.

Detailed Page

The detailed page supports Markdown and syntax highlighting with the help of highlight.js and marked.

Framework

I used egg.js, which was invented by Alibaba Group on the basis of the KOA.js.

BackStage

Login page

List

AddArticle

Intime Preview

The adding article function supports intime preview for what you are writing

item.title: Terrasentia Robot
item.description:
• Utilized LiDAR and camera to help robot navigate autonomously under crop canopy
  • Designed failure self-recovery strategies using Markov Decision Process to reduce labor costs
  • Studied how to use Gazebo to simulate the robot

item.title: GoogleScholarDatasetVisualization
item.description:
This is the fianl project for CS411 at UIUC. We processed a 10GB database and you can check our website here and our source code here

  • Built a web application using React, Apollo and GraphQL that can visualize the trends of popular topics and corresponding publications, visualize the most cited authors and articles, find the connections between different authors and search with keywords
  • Utilized Neo4j database to store connections between articles and authors and generalize the list of related articles
  • Visualized the popularity of research topics with a graph to show the number of publications for a selected year and how the number changed in the past decade
  • Displayed the most cited articles on one of the top three trending topics or research interests
